name: APIGatewayDeploymentStageDescription
description: StageKey is a property of the AWS::ApiGateway::Deployment resource that configures an Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) deployment stage.

properties.name: CacheClusterEnabled
properties.desc: Indicates whether cache clustering is enabled for the stage.

properties.name: CacheClusterSize
properties.desc: The size of the stage's cache cluster.

properties.name: ClientCertificateId
properties.desc: The identifier of the client certificate that API Gateway uses to call your integration endpoints in the stage.

properties.name: DeploymentId
properties.desc: The ID of the deployment that the stage points to.

properties.name: Description
properties.desc: A description of the purpose of the stage.

properties.name: MethodSettings
properties.desc: Configures settings for all of the stage's methods.
properties.type: Amazon API Gateway Deployment StageDescription MethodSetting

properties.name: RestApiId
properties.desc: The ID of a RestApi resource that you're deploying with this stage.

properties.name: StageName
properties.desc: The name of the stage, which API Gateway uses as the first path segment in the invoke Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

properties.name: Variables
properties.desc: A map that defines the stage variables. Variable names must consist of alphanumeric characters, and the values must match the following regular expression: [A-Za-z0-9-._~:/?#&=,]+.
